controlaccess.subject: Carpenters--Labor unions--New York--Auburn.
controlaccess.corpname: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America.
United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America. Local 453 (Auburn, N.Y.)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Oct. 14, 1888 - April 4, 1894. First meeting, S. Galpin pres.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: April 18, 1894 - June 26, 1899. Some loose papers inside cover.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: July 10, 1899 - Dec. 9, 1901. Index to correspondence in back. Many loose papers inside cover.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Oct. 10, 1904 - Apirl 20, 1908. A few original claims for relief (doctor's notes).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: April 15, 1912 - Sept. 14, 1914. Index at end of volume.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: June 23, 1924 - May 21, 1928. Last entry loose inside cover.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Feb. 17, 1964 - March 4, 1968. Loose papers inside cover.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Nov. 15, 1888 - Dec. 17, 1890. Expenses, receipts, fund balances, member names. Very few pages.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1892 (4th quarter) - April 1893. Account balances, relief expenses, membership totals, member names.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: April 1898 - July 1900. Same content as others.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: July 1900 - March 1903. Same content as others.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Jan. 1901 - Sept. 1903. Reports, including balance of several funds, number of members in good standing, receipts, amount of sick benefits paid. 5" x 7", red cover.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: March 1903 - Sept. 1905. Reports, including balance of several funds, number of members in good standing, receipts, amount of sick benefits paid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sept. 1905 - March 1908. Expenses, expenditures, including relief (with name, number of weeks, seniority number).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: April 1908 - Oct. 1910.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Oct. 1910 - Feb. 1912. Receipts, reports, expenses.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Jan. 1919 - Jan. 1931. Expenses, receipts, includes relief payments, names, and duration.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: March 1931 - March 1943

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Jan. 1896 - Dec. 1897. Expenses, receipts, salaries, relief paid. Receipts broken up by dat only, not itemized. Small format (6" x 8"), thin.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Jan. 1898 - March 1899. Expenses, receipts, salaries, relief paid. Receipts broken up by dat only, not itemized. Small format (6" x 8"), thin.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: April 1899 - Oct. 1908. Relief payments, receipts, account balances. Larger format, much thicker and more detailed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Death benefit, contributory, paid with 24 hours of death. Two loose annual reports. Includes 1916 history of the association inside cover.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Per capita taxes paid. List of member unions. Some loose papers inside volume.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Receipts and Expenditures. January 1898-April 1899.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Receipts and Expenditures. January 1896 - December 1897.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: July 10, 1899 - June 24, 1900. Carpenters and Joiners of America. Auburn, NY.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Different Unions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Minutes. Local Union no 453 le J. of A. Auburn, NY. January 6, 1902 - 1904.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America. Local Union No. 453. Auburn, NY. April 6, 1936 - June 17, 1940

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: United Brotherhood of Carpenters & Joiners of America. Auburn, NY.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Union 453, Auburn, NY. July 1899 - October 1908

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: April 18,1894-July 1899. Auburn, NY.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Auburn, NY. October 10, 1904-April 6, 1908

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America. Auburn, NY. Local Union No. 453. October 1, 1888-March 1894

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: October 12, 1914-March 24, 1919.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: April 7, 1919-May 1924.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: April 15, 1912-Sept. 24, 1914 Started by Henry B. King. Auburn, NY.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: June 15, 1959-February 3, 1964. United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joins of America. February 15, 1954-June 15, 1959.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America. Auburn, NY. July 11, 1949-February 1954.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America. February 17, 1964- March 4,1968.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America. Auburn, NY. June 23, 1924-May 7, 1928.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America. July 7, 1947-July 11, 1949

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Receipts and expenses. January 1919-January 1931

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: November 1888-1889

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: December 1893-189

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: October 1910-March 1912
